emails.subject: Products Correction Process – Step 1 Started
emails.to: Support Dnext; Dnext TN - Analysis; DNEXT_ANALYSTS; Customer Success; Dnext Lineups; TradeFlow
emails.cc: Guillaume Goudy; Bastien Lambert; Aya Sakli
emails.body_text:
Hello Team,
We have started working on the products correction. The process will be done in two steps:

1.	
	Step 1: Update products that don’t have a hierarchy and add the HS codes prepared by Pierre.
2.	
	Step 2: Add HS codes for products that already have an existing hierarchy (without changing their parents).

Please note that these changes may affect some tradeflows and dashboards,... . If you encounter any issues, kindly report them to me or Aya.
We aim to complete Step 1 by the end of this week.
Thanks,
Jebrane
emails.body_html:
Hello Team,
We have started working on the products correction. The process will be done in two steps:
  1. Step 1: Update products that don’t have a hierarchy and add the HS codes prepared by Pierre.
  2. Step 2: Add HS codes for products that already have an existing hierarchy (without changing their parents).
Please note that these changes may affect some tradeflows and dashboards,... . If you encounter any issues, kindly report them to me or Aya.
We aim to complete Step 1 by the end of this week.
Thanks,
Jebrane
